screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .isdata file in Apple TextEdit
screenshot.caption: ISDATA file open in Apple TextEdit

description: MacOS stores ISDATA files in the following directory:

Typically, users cannot access this directory (to prevent them from accidentally moving, modifying, or deleting system files). If you do access the com.apple.iconservices.store directory, you will likely find thousands of ISDATA files.
ISDATA files stored in the com.apple.iconservices.store directory are not malware. They are legitimate system files that macOS uses to load icons more quickly.
